message.body: So next Sunday should be good for the barn! Would you be up for a half hour lesson? It'd be $25. My friend seems more up for that rather than turning us loose with her pony :)
Sounds fine as long as $25 buys me not getting laughed at
Ok I have a no laughing guarantee! Can you come up in the evening? It's a little cooler/nicer to ride.
Yeah I should be able to do that. Give me a time and address please :)
What time do I need to be there if I go to your place first? That way I could see it, finally :)
If you get here around 4-430, that'll give us plenty of time for a beer/tour and then to go ride. This'll be fun!
